thread.title_full: 5th Avenue Great Stay - Review of Holiday Inn Express New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: James B
title: 5th Avenue Great Stay
text:
Had a quick weekend stay at the Holiday Inn Express on 5th Ave. & 45th St. Stay was awesome. Staff were friendly, rooms spacious and very clean. Location was great for the attractions we were interested in.
Room Tip: Great access to 5th Avenue and Rockerfeller Building See more room tips
